title: OmegaStarScream
author: OmegaStarScream
created_time: March 23, 2023, 07:33:12 AMLast edit: April 07, 2025, 04:22:20 PM by OmegaStarScream
content: I'm renting my signature space (and my avatar as well). PM me your offers if you're interested.I'm not wearing any signatures for mixers or gambling services.In addition to being part of ChipMixer's signature campaign for many years, you can check my stats from BPIP.org: https://bpip.org/Profile?p=OmegaStarScream

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: If you are against mixer and gambling services, two projects that have active signature campaigns.BestchangeUtopia

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on March 23, 2023, 07:45:11 AMIf you are against mixer and gambling services, two projects that have active signature campaigns.BestchangeUtopiaYou are not getting it at all, who tells you that he did not know that Bestchange and other campaigns are existing? There are some members that do open an offer on service board. This is just one. I too if I like I can open a thread about this too if I think the chance of getting one is high. Who also tells you that people against mixers and gambling on this forum? That sounds new and odd to me.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on March 23, 2023, 07:45:11 AMIf you are against mixer and gambling services, two projects that have active signature campaigns.BestchangeUtopiaQuote from: UchihaSarada on March 23, 2023, 07:45:11 AMIf you are against mixer and gambling services, two projects that have active signature campaigns.BestchangeUtopiaOp never stated that he is against gambling or mixer services. I think he is specifying the kind of service he currently wouldn't want to promote and he has the right to choose the product or service he would like to promote. I also feel that @UchihaSarada is not really insinuating that OP is against gambling and mixers but he was just recommending these two projects to OP because they are neither related to mixers nor gambling. But @UchihaSarada didn't choose the right word because that word 'against' is not appropriate. However, I wish @OmegaStarScream good luck in his quest to get a deserving and suitable contract.

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on March 23, 2023, 07:45:11 AMBestchangeUtopiaThanks for sharing. I've seen them but they're not open to new participants. BTCump.

comments.author: Xinarae*
comments.body: Quote from: OmegaStarScream on March 26, 2023, 11:54:40 AMQuote from: UchihaSarada on March 23, 2023, 07:45:11 AMBestchangeUtopiaThanks for sharing. I've seen them but they're not open to new participants. BTCump.Quote from: Royse777 on March 23, 2023, 03:42:47 AMIt was a great week to be honest. We have lost few staffs. We will miss them. I am looking forward to work with them in the future. You will be missed.We have 2XHero payroll. If you are an exceptional poster then please apply. If you are already in the queue but is not ranked up then please let know that you are in mind. Once there is time, you will perform as good as some of the higher paid members, then you will be promoted.Bottom line, your performance counts other than anything else.Please apply.Looking forward to another great week ahead.SINBAD MIXER Signature & Campaign. Up-to $130/W Opened for special person Hero or legendary slots may be opened, you are already Staff-Legendary i hope you have the opportunity and priority is first.Since it is very easy for you to get good opportunities in another campaign, you can join them even for a short period of time. Until you get another hights rate payable campaign.
